title: Top 5 iOS & Android Apps of December 2021!

media:group.media:title: Top 5 iOS & Android Apps of December 2021!
media:group.media:description:
These are five of our favorite Android and iOS apps of December 2021. Which app is your favorite?

Android (0:10):

Panels: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.fossor.panels
SpotiFlyer: https://f-droid.org/en/packages/com.shabinder.spotiflyer/
Crypto: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kokoschka.michael.crypto
Upscaler: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ethanzone.upscaler
Sgallery: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.hld.anzenbokusu

iOS (3:33): 

Get Sum: https://apps.apple.com/ca/app/get-sum/id1594213177
Milkshake: https://apps.apple.com/app/apple-store/id1452719910
Linc: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/relate-relationship-tracker/id1513780616#?platform=iphone
Pixelmator Photo: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/pixelmator-photo/id1444636541 
NoteCircle: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/notecircle-to-do-list/id1528859917
